mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.cd_nm as part_nm FROM member a LEFT JOIN comm_cmncdm b on a.part = b.cd_id WHERE a.user_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyWord}, '%') AND a.part LIKE CONCAT('%', #{partSearch}, '%') AND a.use_yn = 'Y' AND a.user_grp = 'A' ORDER BY a.part, a.user_nm ASC LIMIT #{currentPerPage} OFFSET #{startIndex};

SELECT count(*) FROM member a LEFT JOIN comm_cmncdm b on a.part = b.cd_id WHERE a.user_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyWord}, '%') AND a.part LIKE CONCAT('%', #{partSearch}, '%') AND a.use_yn = 'Y' AND a.user_grp = 'A'
SELECT cd_id, cd_nm FROM comm_cmncdm WHERE sys_scd = '11' AND tp_cd = '2000'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member WHERE user_id = #{user_id}
SELECT user_id, user_nm, user_phone FROM member WHERE use_yn = 'Y' AND user_grp = 'A' AND part = #{part} AND user_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{user_nm}, '%')
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET use_yn = 'N' WHERE user_id = #{user_id}
